field.label: Version
field.comment: Please select a store view to be able to save / preload different setups for each version.

field.label: Image area width
field.comment: Set width for image section [ in % ], For example you can set it to 60% of the width of the website.
field.tooltip: Note: The sum of Image area width and Move Description and Tabs under infoProduct info area width, should not exceed 100%. This settings is applied only on desktop, on mobile devices the columns will automatically take advantage of the responsive design.

field.label: Product info area width
field.comment: Set width for product info area [ in %], for example you can set it to 40% of the width of the website
field.tooltip: Note: The sum of Image area width and Product info area width, should not exceed 100%. This settings is applied only on desktop, on mobile devices the columns will automatically take advantage of the responsive design.

field.label: Move Description and Tabs under info area
field.comment: Select Yes to move Description tab, More information tab and Reviews tab on the right section/side.

field.label: Position for Product Info
field.comment: Select Position for Product Info

field.label: Remove wishlist
field.comment: Select Yes to remove wishlist button from the product page.

field.label: Remove compare
field.comment: Select Yes to remove compare button from the product page.

field.label: Remove email
field.comment: Select Yes to remove email button from the product page.

field.label: Remove qty box
field.comment: Select Yes to remove quantity box from the product page.

field.label: Remove sku
field.comment: Select Yes to remove SKU info from product page.

field.label: Remove stock availability
field.comment: Select Yes to remove stock availability info from product page.

field.label: Remove Breadcrumbs
field.comment: Select Yes to remove Breadcrumbs section from product page.

field.label: Information Layout on Desktop
field.comment: Select information layout for desktop view. Show information as tabs, accordion or list.

field.label: Tabs Version
field.comment: Select tabs version. Also you can control tab padding from product page CSS options: Product Page -> Other CSS Options -> Tab Container Padding.

field.label: Accordion Version
field.comment: Select accordion version.

field.label: Accordion Collapsible
field.comment: Select accordion collapsible to be able to close all panels.

field.label: Quantity Input Type
field.comment: Select Input type for quantity field.

field.label: Quantity Dropdown Max Value
field.comment: Insert max value for quantity field when is set in dropdown. Example: 10

field.label: Display Swatch Tooltip
field.comment: Select Yes to display the tooltip on hover over swatches on product page. For tooltip to be displayed make sure to have the Display Swatch Tooltip enabled on Category Page settings also.

field.label: Main Image Width
field.comment: Insert width for main image [in px]. Example: 564

field.label: Main Image Height
field.comment: Insert height for main image [in px]. Example: 700

field.label: Thumb Image Width
field.comment: Insert gallery thumb image width [in px]. Example: 80

field.label: Thumb Image Height
field.comment: Insert gallery thumb image height [in px]. Example: 80

field.label: No options available in this Product Page Version.
field.comment:
<script>requirejs(['jquery'],function($) {
					$(document).ready(function() {
						$('#row_weltpixel_product_page_gallery_no_content_msg span').attr('data-config-scope', '');
						$('#weltpixel_product_page_version_version').change(function() {
							var curValue = $(this).val();
							if (curValue == 2 || curValue == 4) {
								$('#row_weltpixel_product_page_gallery_no_content_msg').nextAll('tr').addClass("hidden");
							} else {
								$('#row_weltpixel_product_page_gallery_no_content_msg').nextAll('tr').removeClass("hidden");
							}
						});
					});});</script>

field.label: Gallery navigation style
field.comment: Select style for image gallery on product page.

field.label: Gallery navigation loop
field.comment: Enable/Disable loop for image gallery navigation. Select True to enable loop.

field.label: Turn on/off keyboard arrows navigation
field.comment: Select True to enable keyboard arrows navigation for image gallery on product page.

field.label: Turn on/off arrows on the sides preview
field.comment: Display/Hide arrows on the side of image on product page. Select True to display arrows.

field.label: Background color arrows
field.comment: Select background color for arrows. Example: #FFFFFF

field.label: Display Alt Text on image.
field.comment: Display/Hide Alt text in main image on product page. Make sure you have filed in Alt Text for your product images.

field.label: Sliding direction of thumbnails
field.comment: Select direction of thumbnails. Select Horizontal to display thumbnails below main image, and Vertical to display thumbnails on left side of main image.

field.label: Turn on/off on the thumbs navigation sides
field.comment: Set True to enable the thumbs navigation sides.

field.label: Sliding type of thumbnails
field.comment: Select sliding type of thumbnails.

field.label: Sets transition effect for slides changing
field.comment: Select the transition effect for images.

field.label: Sets transition duration in ms
field.comment: Insert transition duration [in ms]. Example: 500

field.label: Enable Fulscreen Image Zoom
field.comment: Set True to enable the Fullscreen Image Zoom functionality, when clicked on product page image.

field.label: Fullscreen navigation style
field.comment: Select style for fullscreen image gallery.

field.label: Fullscreen navigation loop
field.comment: Enable/Disable loop for fullscreen image gallery navigation. Select True to enable loop.

field.label: Turn on/off arrows on the sides preview
field.comment: Display/Hide arrows on the side of image when in fullscreen. Select True to display arrows.

field.label: Display alt text as image title
field.comment: Display/Hide Alt text of image when in fullscreen. Make sure you have filed in Alt Text for your product images.

field.label: Sliding direction of thumbnails in full screen
field.comment: Select direction of thumbnails when in fullscreen. Select Horizontal to display thumbnails below main image, and Vertical to display thumbnails on left side of main image.

field.label: Sets transition effect for slides changing
field.comment: Select the transition effect for images in fullscreen.

field.label: Sets transition duration in ms
field.comment: Insert transition duration [in ms]. Example: 500

field.label: Enable Magnifier
field.comment: Enable/Disable Magnifier. Select the action that activates magnifier from below.

field.label: Zoom of fullscreen
field.comment: Zoom step in percents for the fullscreen view. Example: 20

field.label: Top position of magnifier
field.comment: Insert Top position of magnifier. Leave blank for default.

field.label: Left position of magnifier
field.comment: Insert Left position of magnifier. Leave blank for default.

field.label: Width of magnifier block
field.comment: Insert Width of magnifier. Leave blank for default.

field.label: Height of magnifier block
field.comment: Insert Height of magnifier. Leave blank for default.

field.label: Action that activates zoom
field.comment: Select the action that triggers the zoom/magnifier.

field.label: Radius
field.comment: Set Radius of the swatches corners on product page. Example: 25px

field.label: Width
field.comment: Set Width of the swatches on product page. Example: 30px

field.label: Height
field.comment: Set Height of the swatches on product page. Example: 30px

field.label: Line Height
field.comment: Set Line height for text on swatches on product page. Example: 29px

field.label: Font Size
field.comment: Set Font Size of text on swatches on product page. Example: 10px

field.label: Thumbnail Image Border
field.comment: Select color for Thumbnail images border. Example: #CCCCCC

field.label: Tab Active Background
field.comment: Select color for background of active Tab. Example: #FFFFFF

field.label: Tab Background
field.comment: Select color for background of Tabs. Example: #FFFFFF

field.label: Tab Text Active Color
field.comment: Select color of text from Active tab. Example: #000000

field.label: Tab Text Color
field.comment: Select color for text of Inactive tab. Example: #000000

field.label: Tab Container Padding
field.comment: Insert padding for tab text container. Example: 25px 50px 25px 50px (top, right, bottom, left)

field.label: Page Background Color
field.comment: Select background color of Product page. Example: #FFFFFF

field.label: Page Top Background Color
field.comment: Select background color for top of page. Example: #FFFFFF

field.label: Page Bottom Background Color
field.comment: Select background color for bottom of page (tabs area). Example: #FFFFFF
